radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed tomography (CT) of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple enlarged lymph nodes in the left common iliac, left external iliac, and left inguinal regions with associated stranding in the soft tissues of the anterior pelvic walls. Areas of hypodensity consistent with necrosis were seen in a left external iliac node (2.4 cm) and in a partially visualized left inguinal node (2.2 cm). Small paraaortic and right inguinal nodes (<1 cm in diameter) were also seen. Small, fat-containing bilateral inguinal hernias. Enlargement of the liver (span, 22 cm) and borderline enlargement of the spleen (12.8 cm). Nonobstructing renal calculi visualized on the left side; no evidence of bowel strangulation or obstruction.
